languages.text: "Такова процедура. Устрашение развязывает языки, мучения размягчают волю смутьянов. Чернь должно держать в благоговейном ужасе". {n}Фразы устава звенят металлом.{/n}

"That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Такова процедура. Устрашение развязывает языки, мучения размягчают волю смутьянов. Чернь должно держать в благоговейном ужасе". {n}Фразы устава звенят металлом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues, torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The enforcer quotes the regulations with metallic enunciation.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

traits.locale_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

traits.locale_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure habituelle. L'intimidation délie les langues et la torture étouffe toute velléité de révolte. Violence et terreur sont le lot quotidien de la populace. » {n}Sa voix résonne à travers la salle alors qu'elle énonce froidement le règlement en vigueur à bord.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure habituelle. L'intimidation délie les langues et la torture étouffe toute velléité de révolte. Violence et terreur sont le lot quotidien de la populace. » {n}Sa voix résonne à travers la salle alors qu'elle énonce froidement le règlement en vigueur à bord.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «Es lo que exige el procedimiento. La intimidación afloja lenguas. La tortura erosiona la voluntad del sedicioso. La chusma solo debe conocer el asombro y el terror». {n}Su voz retumba al enunciar las regulaciones de la nave.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es lo que exige el procedimiento. La intimidación afloja lenguas. La tortura erosiona la voluntad del sedicioso. La chusma solo debe conocer el asombro y el terror». {n}Su voz retumba al enunciar las regulaciones de la nave.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “标准程序就是这么规定的，恐吓可以让叛乱分子招供，而折磨可以动摇叛乱分子的意志。乌合之众只懂得敬畏与恐惧。”{n}戒律大师高声复述着船上的规章制度，声音响彻整个舱室。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “标准程序就是这么规定的，恐吓可以让叛乱分子招供，而折磨可以动摇叛乱分子的意志。乌合之众只懂得敬畏与恐惧。”{n}戒律大师高声复述着船上的规章制度，声音响彻整个舱室。{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「それが手順だ。威嚇は舌を緩める。苦痛は扇動者の意志を蝕む。群衆は畏怖と恐怖のみを知ることになるだろう」{n}船内規則の言葉が部屋中に響き渡る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それが手順だ。威嚇は舌を緩める。苦痛は扇動者の意志を蝕む。群衆は畏怖と恐怖のみを知ることになるだろう」{n}船内規則の言葉が部屋中に響き渡る。{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Die Prozedur verlangt es so. Einschüchterung lockert die Zunge. Folter zermürbt den Willen der Abtrünnigen. Der Pöbel darf nur Furcht und Schrecken kennen." {n}Die Enforcerin zitiert die Vorschriften in metallischem Ton.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Prozedur verlangt es so. Einschüchterung lockert die Zunge. Folter zermürbt den Willen der Abtrünnigen. Der Pöbel darf nur Furcht und Schrecken kennen." {n}Die Enforcerin zitiert die Vorschriften in metallischem Ton.{/n}
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Prosedür bunu emrediyor. Göz korkutmayla diller çözülür, işkenceyle de isyancının iradesi kırılır. Ayaktakımı, yalnızca korku ve dehşetten anlar." {n}Geminin mevzuatına ait maddeler, tüm odada yankılanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is what the procedure demands. Intimidation loosens tongues. Torment erodes the seditionary's will. The rabble are to know only awe and terror." {n}The words of the ship's regulations ring out across the room.{/n}
